subject: Re: [PATCH v2] mm/hugetlb: Restore failed global reservations to subpool

reviews.author: Andrew Morton
reviews.summary: Andrew Morton requested clarification on the user-space visible effects of the bug and asked for a review

reviews.author: Joshua Hahn (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer asked the author to reword a section of the patch description for clarity, specifically to make it more explicit that the subpool's used counter can become stuck at its max value after failed allocation attempts.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: Usama Arif acknowledged the patch, stating that without this fix, used_hpages would continue to leak if hugetlb_acct_memory fails.
